title: Gift Idea For Dad: Columbo's Blu-Ray Box Sets Are Steeply Discounted At Amazon
description: The last few years have seen a resurgence in appreciation for Columbo, and if you're looking to catch up with Peter Falk's charming detective, both of the recently released Blu-ray collections are on sale for nice discounts at Amazon.Released on Blu-ray last holiday, Columbo's original seven-season run is available for only $60 at Amazon. This collection retailed for $150 when it was first announced, but these days it's often available for $75-$85. Meanwhile, Columbo: The Return, which released on Blu-ray in July, is discounted to only $37.49. This is by far the best price yet for The Return, so now you can get the complete Columbo series for less than $100 total. See both Columbo box sets at Amazon Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Stalker 2: Heart Of Chornobyl Collector's Edition Restocked At Amazon Ahead Of Tuesday's Launch
description: Stalker 2 Collector’s Edition $180 Preorder at Amazon (in stock) Stalker 2 Limited Edition $80 Preorder at Amazon (sold out) Stalker 2 Standard Edition $60 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Best Buy Preorder at Walmart Preorder at Target Stalker 2 Ultimate Edition $350 See the Ultimate Edition (sold out) The long sold-out Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl Collector's Edition is back in stock at Amazon ahead of the highly anticipated sequel's November 20 release. This $180 edition comes with a bunch of physical collectibles and digital goodies. If you're interested in Stalker 2's Collector's Edition, it'd be wise to order soon. Developer GSC Game World recently announced this fresh Collector's Edition print run alongside a print run for the (still) sold-out Limited Edition. Preorder Stalker 2 Collector's Edition Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl Collector's Edition Stalker 2 is the sequel to the 2007 survival horror shooter Stalker: Shadow of Chernobyl. As an Xbox Series X|S and PC exclusive, Stalker 2 will be available on Xbox Game Pass Ultimate on launch day for Xbox, PC, and cloud streaming. A physical standard edition is also available to preorder for $60. All editions of Stalker 2 come with in-game bonuses. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Half-Life 2 turns 20, gets a big update, documentary, and 100% off sale price
description: Just like it did with the original Half-Life last year – celebrating the seminal first-person shooter’s 25th anniversary with a major update, a documentary, and a 100% off sale – Valve is celebrating the arguably even more influential Half-Life 2’s 20th anniversary with, you guessed it, an update, a documentary, and a 100% off sale.  […]

But one of the more impressive things about the show to me is how restrained it is about throwing in references and Easter […]

author: Zack Zwiezen

title: Half-Life 2: Episode 3 could have featured an ice gun and blob monsters, as seen in new documentary footage
description: Half-Life 2 just turned 20-years-old, and to celebrate Valve updated the game with some new features. They also produced a documetary in which several of its development team look back on their work on the game and its episodic expansions - including the never-released Episode 3. The documentary includes in-progress footage of the episode in action for the first time, and it shows an ice gun and a new liquid enemy type. Read more
author: Graham Smith

title: Half-Life 2 is 20 years old and has been updated with Steam Workshop support and developer commentary
description: Half-Life 2 just turned 20 years old, and to celebrate Valve have released an update for their classic first-person shooter. In brief: they've recorded developer commentary; they've added Steam Workshop support; Episodes One and Two are now part of the package; and there are some bug fixes and new graphics options. Grab it before the end of the weekend (November 18th at 6pm GMT) and it's also free to keep on Steam. Read more

author: Wilhelm Arcturus

title: Fall Bucket List
description: My fall bucket list! Try a new chili recipe (I’ve got my eye on this one), and then make enough to share with my neighbors. Bake brownies, and perhaps share those with the neighbors, too, when I drop off the chili. Go on a long hike, then come home and drink hot apple cider. Buy an epic pair of rain boots. Go for a walk with Marnie and stomp into a pile of leaves with those epic rain boots. Snuggle into a warm, cozy sweater that makes me feel amazing when I wear it. Side note, is it just me, or is it surprisingly difficult to find a sweater that fits well and ticks all the boxes? Every time I try one on, I find at least 5 things that I want to change. Handwrite a few letters on nice stationary and send them via snail mail. Watch a classic musical wearing my coziest pajamas; of course a snuggly blanket will be up in the mix, too. Find a soft, brightly colored scarf; perhaps one[Continue reading...] The post Fall Bucket List appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 856
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1.Something you accomplished recently that makes you feel good? I helped Connor start a weekly chart to track her chores around the house, and we’ve been refining it over a few weeks to see what works and what doesn’t work. It took a while to figure it out, to be honest. I’m feeling good about it, and I think she is too; I’m hoping it sets her up with good habits for the future. 2. Last beauty product you bought? I grabbed a cream shadow from Charlotte Tilbury, the Eyes to Mesmerise Cream Shadow in Oyster Pearl, a shimmery bronze-gold, from the Sephora fall sale. 3. Pick your fun eyeliner color – green, purple or blue? Purple, please! 4. Walking outside in the rain – yes or no?[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 856 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
